N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5020.5 - Appointment of alternates to the Medical Board

State Regulations

The Retirement Board may appoint an alternate for each of the
doctors appointed to the Medical Board. The alternate shall be board-certified
in the medical specialty of the doctor for whom s/he will serve as alternate. In the event that one of the appointed doctors is unable to attend a regularly
scheduled Medical Board meeting, the alternate shall be notified and, whenever
possible, shall serve in the doctor's place. The alternate shall have the same
powers and privileges as the appointed doctor whenever s/he is serving on the

Medical Board in the appointed doctor's place. Notes
